about_the_game:
This Training Set allows instant access to Base game characters' Ninjutsu, Secret Techniques, and items normally only available for your avatar at Training Rank 5.

■ Base Game Characters
● Training Rank Reward x20
- Boruto
- Sarada
- Mitsuki
- Naruto
- Sasuke
- Sakura
- Kakashi
- Sai
- Yamato
- Gaara
- Itachi
- Kisame
- Deidara
- Pain
- Konan
- Kabuto
- Shikamaru
- Choji
- Rock Lee
- Hinata

*Once you purchase the DLC, items can be claimed from the Gift Box at the Inn.
*Purchasing this Training Set will only give you access to Ninjutsu, Secret Techniques, or items from DLC characters you have purchased.
*Purchasing this Training Set will not increase your Training Rank for the listed masters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
